description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows Mobile Broadband driver (CVE-2024-30002):

1. Download and install the relevant updates for your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, reference: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771).
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2, reference: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771).
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2, reference: [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770).
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, reference: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768).
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2, reference: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768).

**Details**:
- These updates address improper input validation issues related to the Mobile Broadband driver, significantly reducing the risk of exploit.
- Ensure that your system is updated to the specified build numbers to properly apply these fixes: 
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2 (10.0.22631.3593), 
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2 (10.0.22621.3593), 
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2 (10.0.22000.2960), 
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2 (10.0.19045.4412), 
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2 (10.0.19044.4412).
  Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
